issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: branch-2 is now being used for 2.3.0 development. The build files will need to reflect this change.

comments.body: Attaching a patch to transition branch-2 to 2.3.0 dev branch. [~pxiong] [~thejas] [~aihuaxu] Could you please review this change and that it is appropriate to transition this branch for 2.3.0 dev work. Thanks
review posted at https://reviews.apache.org/r/57982/
Thanks for your work [~ngangam], i guess we need to backport this to 2.3 ASAP. and we should also create another patch for the next 3.0.0. also ccing [~ashutoshc] and [~owen.omalley]

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12860799/HIVE-16301.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12860799 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Thanks [~pxiong] I have cloned this jira to HIVE-16316 for the master branch. Have you had a chance to look at the patch itself? Thanks again
LGTM, i think we just need more changes. Could u resubmit the patch with the changes for a ptest run? After that, I think we will be good.

An additional change to the root pom.xml
{{<hive.version.shortname>2.3.0</hive.version.shortname>}}
[~pxiong] What ptest changes were you suggesting? I am not aware of any changes to the ptest scripts between releases. Could you please elaborate? Thanks
[~ngangam], i was talking about the ant, hwi and orc which do not exist after you re-clone. +1, pending ptests.

[~pxiong] Yes, I was unaware of this documentation but I used maven's versions:set command, slightly different command though {{mvn versions:set -DnewVersion=2.3.0-SNAPSHOT -DoldVersion=2.2.0-SNAPSHOT -DgenerateBackupPoms=false}} to update the POMs. But for some reason, I thought it did not update the {{hive.version.shortname}} that I had to do it manually.

Since I am not creating a new release branch, and just updating the release version of the current dev branch, step #8 isnt applicable to me. Correct me if I am wrong.
thanks. let's push this to master once ptest is done.
you meant {{branch-2}} right ? :)
I am tracking the {{master}} changes in HIVE-16316. That change is to mark master for 3.0.0. Is that ok ? Sorry for the confusion.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:

ATTACHMENT ID: 12861065 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~ngangam], org.apache.hive.beeline.TestSchemaTool.testValidateSchemaTables
sounds related?
yes, it sounds related. I will investigate.

Also this is a fairly new test, I added in 2.2. Appears that this is a test issue. The test uses the HiveSchemaTool.doUpgrade() API incorrectly. The test intends to upgrade from 2.0.0 to 2.2.0. Instead, due to incorrect usage, it schema stays at 2.0.0 and compares the DB tables with the 2.0.0 schema files and succeeds.
{code}
Starting metastore schema initialization to 2.0.0
Initialization script hive-schema-2.0.0.derby.sql
Initialization script completed
Validating metastore schema tables
Succeeded in schema table validation.
No schema upgrade required from version 2.2.0
Validating metastore schema tables
Succeeded in schema table validation.
Validating metastore schema tables
Table(s) [ [sequence_table, nucleus_tables] ] are missing from the metastore database schema.
Schema table validation failed!!!
Validating metastore schema tables
Succeeded in schema table validation.
{code}

But since the new version being added is 2.3.0, the schema is upgraded to 2.3.0 and hence it sees missing tables that were added in 2.1.0 and hence the failure.
{code}
tarting metastore schema initialization to 2.0.0
Initialization script hive-schema-2.0.0.derby.sql
Initialization script completed
Validating metastore schema tables
Succeeded in schema table validation.
Metastore connection URL:	 jdbc:derby:/home/hiveptest/35.188.60.195-hiveptest-0/apache-github-source-source/itests/hive-unit/target/tmp/test_metastore-1885768448;create=true
Metastore Connection Driver :	 org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver
Metastore connection User:	 APP
Starting upgrade metastore schema from version 2.2.0 to 2.3.0
Upgrade script upgrade-2.2.0-to-2.3.0.derby.sql
Completed upgrade-2.2.0-to-2.3.0.derby.sql
Validating metastore schema tables
Table(s) [ [key_constraints, write_set] ] are missing from the metastore database schema.
Schema table validation failed!!!
{code}

Fixed the test. Will upload new patch shortly.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12861145 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
The 2 test failures seem unrelated. The latest patch resolved the TestSchemaTool test failure. So it looks good to me. Please let me know it its ready to be committed. Thanks
pushed to master and 2.3 thanks [~ngangam] for the work!
[~pxiong] Thanks for the commit. Quick question though. Its my understanding that master should be 3.0.0 release, not 2.3.0. Am I wrong? Thanks
True, that is why i asked u to create 16316. We need to push 16316 to master as well, but not 2.3.

I will have the patch for 3.0.0 uploaded today. Thanks for the review again.
Also you may have accidentally changed ownership of this jira. Flipping it back to me. If it was intentional, please let me know. Thanks
I never changed the ownership of the jira. Maybe it is because I renamed it...
